item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: 60 Second Songbird, Avenhart, For What It'S Worth, Lonesome Road Blues, Mark O'Connor, Ola Belle Reed, The Beatles, The Trailblazers, Tony Rice, Truck Bed Boys.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 8/2017
item.description: Including: Angel City Bluegrass Band, Billy Strings, Blue Highway, For What It'S Worth, Jim And Jesse, Kruger Brothers, Mountain Heart, Red Wing, The Travelin’ Mccourys, Willie Watson.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 7/2017
item.description: Including: Bluegrass, Canadian Bluegrass, Dan Tyminski, Dreamcatcher, Front Country, Harley Allen/Mike Lilly, New Country, Remedy Tree, Tim O'Brien, Ymsb.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 6/2017
item.description: Including: "In Despair", Banjolina, Bobby Osborne, Charlie Poole, Chicken Wire Empire, Doc Watson, Emitt-Nershi Band, Rob Ickes, The Creak, Tony Rice.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 5/2017
item.description: Including: Bud'S Collective, Doc Watson, High Fidelity, Josh Williams, Kenny Ingram, Louvin Brothers, Mac Doc & Del, Mountain Dew, The Best Of Bluegrass, The Warren G. Hardings.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 4/2017
item.description: Including: Death By Triple Fiddle, Little Big Shots, Panopticon, Ralph Stanley Ii, Speakin' To That Mountain, The Dubliners, The Good Old Boys, The Warren G. Hardings, Tim O'Brien, Walls Of Time.

item.description: Including: "Wings", Akus, Freeborn Man, Kruger Brothers, Magnus Wiik, My Heart, Sturgill Simpson, The Pogues, Tony Rice & Norman Blake, Wheel Hoss.

item.description: Including: Bill Monroe, Billy Strings & Don Julin, Caleb Meyer, Chicken Wire Empire, Crooked Still, New Grass Revival, Sideline, The Bluegrass Album Band, Train 45, Trampled By Turtles.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 1/2017
item.description: Including: Cascade Crescendo, Circus No.9, Dave Evans, Grassland String Band, Levon Helm & Sheryl Crow, Red Haired Boy, The Dead South, The Plate Scrapers, Three Quarter Moon, Tony Rice Unit.
